S.FORM: North Korea Gaga kska Yacow ka Korea, north, 40 00 N, 127 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 120,538 sq km(hangan na o Tg99)(knlbanga dxgal o 120,408 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 130 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 25,115,311 hiyi. Gaga Pyongyang ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 15 idas 8 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Korea, north ga wada sugan 21.80 ka dxgal qpahan, 46 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 32.20 na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Kim Jong un, pnaah hngkawas2016 idas 5 jiyax 9pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
